1.title: Episode #1.1

episode of.title: All gardens great and small (TV Series 2017– )

1.plot: Dee visits julian clary's restored kent garden. She explores tim and lesley's tropical garden in worcestershire. There's also some topiary and an urban garden.

2.title: Episode #1.2

episode of.title: All gardens great and small (TV Series 2017– )

2.plot: Dee meets mona, who is anticipating a visit from the austrian alan titchmarsh; and she spends time with her nephew tom.

3.title: Episode #1.3

episode of.title: All gardens great and small (TV Series 2017– )

3.plot: Dee visits nigel and vincent, who entertain visitors with a clarinet choir; a garden planted on river barges; and a pub landlady famed for her hanging baskets.

imdb.title: All gardens great and small
akas: All gardens great and small (United Kingdom)
plot: Dee hart dyke, one of britain's best amateur gardeners, visits open gardens around the country and tries converting her daughter miranda hart to the joys of horticulture.
